meta_title: Stock Turnover Formula: Optimizing MRO Inventory in 2026
meta_description: Why do 70% of plants overstock critical spares? Master the stock turnover formula to slash carrying costs and improve maintenance reliability with Factory AI.
title: The Stock Turnover Formula for Maintenance: A Definitive Guide to MRO Inventory Optimization

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Stock Turnover Formula for Maintenance: A Definitive Guide to MRO Inventory Optimization

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern industrial warehouse and maintenance shop. In the foreground, a diverse team of maintenance professionals (one man, one woman) are standing near a well-organized shelving unit containing industrial motors and gearboxes. They are wearing clean, high-visibility vests, white hard hats, and safety glasses. One person is holding a rugged industrial tablet, but only the back of the device is visible to the camera. The background shows a clean, brightly lit manufacturing floor with a conveyor system. The lighting is natural and bright, conveying a sense of organized, high-tech efficiency. No text or logos are visible on any surfaces. Full-body view of the professionals.
